ideas.title: Privacy preserving location tracker
ideas.author: hackyguru
ideas.excerpt: A location tracker that does not expose user's location and enables them to share it with each other provided that they are shared access

ideas.title: Decentralised and private GitHub
ideas.author: hackyguru
ideas.excerpt: Centralised version control and code hosting platforms like GitHub can pose privacy and censorship risks to developers who are working on critical areas of development. A decentralised alternative to GitHub could be revolutionary in fixing this problem.
